attributes.action: Decriminalise the possession, production and consumption of Cannabis.
attributes.additional_details: Cannabis is a drug widely accepted in communities across the country, legalisation will take production and distribution out of the hands of criminal organisations. Allowing for local businesses with regulation from the government to dispense and consume cannabis in both Medicinal and Recreational environments.
attributes.background: Legalise the production, distribution and consumption of Cannabis in Medicinal and recreational settings.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627573
